Docs.remarks: Calling converts the image to grayscale. The images might be converted to grayscale to reduce the complexity of the model. The grayed out images contain less information to process than the colored images. Another use case for converting to grayscale is to generate new images out of the existing ones, so you can have a larger dataset, a technique known as data augmentation. For end-to-end image processing pipelines, and scenarios in your applications, see the examples in the machinelearning-samples github repository.
